title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Steelers, Joe Burrow
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Steelers, Joe Burrow
description:
Colin explains why he feels the Steelers may have a tough season, and why we need to slow down on Bengals QB Joe Burrow.


Guest: Warren Moon, Rob Parker
